data.title: CosmoCov: Configuration space covariances for projected galaxy 2-point statistics
data.name: CosmoCov
data.description: Configuration Space Covariances for Projected Galaxy 2-Point Statistics

evidence: "Configuration Space Covariances for Projected Galaxy 2-Point Statistics, built on **CosmoLike**. We provide a flat sky covariance module... and a curved sky covariance module."

"To get started with computing covariances, follow the steps below: 1. Clone this repository... 2. Navigate to the covs directory and run command: $ make covs ... Several executables are created: `cov_flat_fft` ... `cov` ..."

"As an exmaple, run command:  $ ./cov 1 ini_files/cov_test_g.ini to compute the 1st block of the curved sky 3x2pt Gaussian covariance of the test example... The result of this block is output to the directory: `output/out_cov_test`."
